text:
The #Italiangovernment is organising a flight to the #Chinese city of #Wuhan - epicentre of the new #coronavirus outbreak - to repatriate Italians stranded there, the Foreign Ministry said in a statement on Wednesday.

Photo: IANS pic.twitter.com/Tw4ylGHcNm
text_html: The #Italiangovernment is organising a flight to the #Chinese city of #Wuhan - epicentre of the new #coronavirus outbreak - to repatriate Italians stranded there, the Foreign Ministry said in a statement on Wednesday. Photo: IANS pic.twitter.com/Tw4ylGHcNm

text: Italy is arranging a flight on Thursday to evacuate its citizens from the Chinese city of Wuhan, the epicentre of the outbreak of the #coronavirus. @ItalyMFA said "around 50" Italians were stranded in Wuhan, which is basically on complete lockdown
text_html: Italy is arranging a flight on Thursday to evacuate its citizens from the Chinese city of Wuhan, the epicentre of the outbreak of the #coronavirus. @ItalyMFA said "around 50" Italians were stranded in Wuhan, which is basically on complete lockdown
